alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 8:59PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage For the Bayou Des Cannes...including Eunice...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Whisky Chitto Creek...including Mittie...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Oakdale, Oberlin, Kinder, White Oak Park, Salt Water Barrier...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Vermilion River...including Carencro, Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 900 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Glenmora. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, When the river is rising and forecast to reach 16 feet, portions of Highway 112 between Highway 121 and Beechwood Church is subject to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning and continue rising to 16.0 feet Sunday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Glenmora 12.0 5.2 Tue 8 pm CST 9.3 13.2 14.6 &&
